cards.header: Nigute nkora urukurikirane mu ma sanamu?

cards.text:
## Muriki cigwa muzokwiga  
• Ingene wubaka clips yamasanamu kugira ukore urukurikirane.  
• Ingene ukiresha ubuhinga butandukanye urukurikirane rw’igikorwa.  
• Ingene urukurikirane ruterimbere rwongereza inguvu zinkuru yawe.

Urutonde rwa ma plan n’urukurikiranerwa mafoto. Ikozwe na ma plan ahigikiranye, urukurikirane rumwe rwama foto rurashobora gusigura inkuru yose. Storymaker yitaho gukoresha ama plan meshi ngo ikore urukurikirane rukwiye.

## Ishingiro rugufata urulurikirane rwama sanamu  
Kugira mutegure urukurikirane mutegerezwa gucagagura ikintu cose co munkuru yawe. Bishobora kuba ari igitigiri gitoc’uduce, canke twinshi. Mutegerezwa kumenya ibice vyose imbere yo gufatanya urukurikirane rwose.  
Raba kano karorero. Umuhinga ashaka gukora inkuru kukibanza c’ivyamwa bizwi. Bashaka kwerekana igice umuntu ariko agura ivyamwa.

cards.header: Tuzokenera kubona umuntu ariko arariha ivyamwa.
Nkurukurikirane rwarwa ma plan atatu murutonde rutanga inkuru isanzwe, mugabo rukwiye.

cards.text: Kumenya inkuru yawe biguha ubwigenge mu gufata ama foto yawe murutonde urwari rwo rwose. Mu mpera mutegerezwa kuvyegeranya kugira mushikirize inkuru yanyu.

Izo mpande nintango, hagati, niherezoyinkuru yawe. Hariho umuntu, hariho, ikimanyu c’icamwa, uwo muntu ariko arariha ivyamwa. Ninkuru isanzwe mugabo ikora. Murashobora kwongerako ikiganiro numudandaza  canke umuguzi wivyamwa. Mushobora no gushiramwo uruhande rurerure kugira musigure ikibanza.

Naho inkuru yawe yoba igoye, ntiwibagire gufata amasanamu mumice itatu : intango, ivyohagati, nimpera. Igice cose gishobora kugira urukurikirane , hamwe n’ibintu bitandukanye muri cadre. Muri rusangi, les plans zitegerezwa guhuza n’urukurikirane rumwe rugizwe na vyabice bitatu. Munkuru zimwe zimwe mushobora kuba mufise ibibanza bifise ama plans atanu (canke arenga) kugice cose c’inkuru.

Ubuhinga bumyenyerewe gukoreshwa iyo utazi inkuru muriko muravuga, nugutangura na ma plan ya kure, tangura gufata ku ma plan akurikirana. Muriko muregaranya ama foto yanyu murutonde, bitoztanga urutonde kama. Mukoresheje ama plan atanu yintango: yagutse, maremare, abayabaye, yegeranye. Insiguro , muzoshobora gukora urukurikirane rukwiye.

## Urukurikirane mukibanza n’inyuma yikibanza  
![](7.png)  
Mushaka kwerekana igikorwa mupande zitandukanye mumwanya umwe, mutegerezwa gufata mubihe bitandukanye. Birazwi murukurikirane mufata mubibanza ninyuma y’ibibanza. Mugukora urukwirikirane mukibanza ninyuma y’ikibanza , fata impande zibiri mumwanya umwe. Dufate ako karorero ahou mu hinga akora cinema afashe umuntu mukibanza ninyuma yikibanza ariko arndika kumashini.

media.media_caption: The first shot is the character’s face in a medium shot while typing on the keyboard.
The second shot, the reverse shot in this sequence, should be a shot of whatever the character is doing in the first shot. In this case, typing on the keyboard.

When you cut these two shots together, it will appear as if the subject is typing on their keyboard. While we used a medium shot in the first shot, it could also be a close-up. This is a matter of style on your part, but the other shots in your video will help you make that decision. That is it. You have enough shots to construct a shot / reverse shot.

This technique also works to show what a subject may be looking at. Either an object, or potentially another person. For example, if you want to show someone on their phone, film their face while they use their phone and then film the phone they are using.

You are not limited to using only two shots. Adding more shots allows you to show how the process of the action changes over time. If a task is becoming more difficult, you might show a second shot of the subject appearing interested while writing an email, and end with a look of satisfaction when they send the email.

cards.text:
## Igice vy’ikiganiro  
Ibiganiro bikorwa na ma clips arimwo abantu. Koresha amasanamu yo hagati na hagati canke amasanamu yegereye. Kwirikira ibintu ngendegwako zitangwa na Story Maker mujisho rya camera iyo mugize ama didane. Ikintu ca hafi canke ca kure gituma bigora kumva ikiganiro, canke kutangura imigenderanire hagati yawa muntu nabandi bantu.

media.media_caption: Example of changing composition after a question

cards.text: Muhitemwo cadre mugumye iyo. Mumaze guhitamwo uruhande rwa cadre uwo mufata ahagararamwo, mugumizeho, gumizaho gushika uwo ufata ahejeje kwishuraikibazo. Hindura gusa ibigize cadre hagati y’ibibazo.

media.media_caption: How to set up good head space in your shot

cards.text: Gumya ikibanza ciza c’imbere. Mutabizi neza, mumenye, raba cadrage mucirwa ca ma plan.

media.media_caption: Example of not panning away, but adding a shot in later

cards.text: Ntuhindukize canke ngo uhindure ikibanza ca camera iyo uwo muntu uriko urafata ariko aganira nabo hanze yikibanza uriko umufatiramwo. Inyuma yaho uwo muntu uriko urafata ahejeje kwishura kubibazo kuri camera, fata isanamu yigikorwa camera yaritumberejeko.

## Ntimwibagire  
Urukurikirane rwa ma plan/ contrechamp bifasha kwerekana igikorwa kibandanya mwisanamu zawe. Urukurikirane rwuduce tw’amasanamu/na contrechamp nuburyo bwiza kugira uronke ama sanamu meza. Urukurikirane rwiza  rwishura ibibazo bitandatu bihambaye twamaze kudondagura( ni nde, niki, nihehe, ryari, kuberiki urwo rubanza). Ugukora urukurikirane rwiza bisigura gufata amasanamu kumpande zitandukanye za ma plan, zirimwo ibice vyiyongerako munkuru. Mushize hamwe urukurikirane rwinshi,bituma inkuru itumvikana.

cards.question: Nikihe gitigiri gito ca ma plan mugukora plan y’ikibanza umufatiramwo, ninyuma y’ikibanza?
Nivyo canke sivyo: Urukurikirane rwikibanza/ ahatandukanye n’ikibanza vyonyene bishobora kwerekana ico uwo muntu ariko araraba.

choices.text: Nivyo, berekana gusa ivyo uyo muntu  ariko araraba.
Sivyo, bashobora kwerekana ico uwo muntu ufata ariko ariko arakora.

cards.question: Nizihe plan zishoboka kuri plan y’ikibanza n’inyuma y’ikibanza?
Nivyo canke sivyo: Ukongerako ama sanamu abafasha kwerekana ingene igikorwa cakozwe, nivyagiye birahinduka kumwanya kumwanya.

choices.text: Nivyo, plan yose ishobora kwerekana uruhande rutandukanye mugufata.
Sivyo, kwoongerako ama  plan bitera ama didane mubantu gusa.
